author: Chelseahavoc
title: Faces shouldn't be upside down
review:
This is a good set. 
I like that his arms are quite moveable and playable compared to his friendly counterpart. 
He is slightly harder to build compared to lumiare. I do admit even with the instructions he was a bit difficult. I really dislike that his face is completely free-spinning. He constantly needs adjusted while on display because his face likes to be upside down.
